Headline: Temporary Reroute
ShortDescription: WB #103 buses will operate via 103rd, Longwood, 107th, and Western, then resume their normal route on 103rd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?
Westbound #103 West 103rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 103rd, Longwood, 107th, and Western, then resume their normal route on 103rd.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Why is service being changed?
Buses are rerouted due to construction on 103rd/Leavitt.

Headline: #8A South Halsted Temporary Reroute near Halsted/Emerald
ShortDescription: 8A S. Halsted buses temp. rrtd NB: Halsted, 95th, State, 87th, Halsted; SB: Halsted, 87th, Lafayette, 95th, Halsted; due to street blockage near Halsted/Emerald

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#8A South Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to street blockage near Halsted/Emerald.

Northbound buses will operate via Halsted, 95th, State, 87th, then resume their normal route on Halsted.

Southbound buses will operate via Halsted, 87th, Lafayette, 95th, then resume their normal route on Halsted.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Temporary #112 Vincennes/111th Reroute at 95th/Vincennes
ShortDescription: 112 Vincennes/111th buses are temporarily rerouted near 95th/Vincennes.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#112 Vincennes/111th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 95th, Vincennes, 103rd, Halsted, 95th, and resume normal route, due to street blockage near 95th/Vincennes.

Allow extra travel time.

#95 95th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 95th, Vincennes, 103rd, Halsted, 95th, and resume normal route, due to street blockage, near 95th/Vincennes.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Temporary #9 Ashland Reroute at 95th/Vincennes
ShortDescription: 9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted near 95th/Vincennes.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 95th, Vincennes, 103rd, Halsted, 95th, and resume normal route, due to street blockage near 95th/Vincennes.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #21 Cermak Temporary Westbound Reroute near Cicero/Racine
ShortDescription: Westbound 21 Cermak buses are temporarily rerouted via Cermak, Halsted, 18th, Loomis, Cermak,  due to street blockage near Cicero/Racine.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #21 Cermak buses are temporarily rerouted via Cermak, Halsted, 18th, Loomis, Cermak and resume  normal route on Cicero: due to street blockage near Cicero/Racine.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #78 Montrose Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Montrose/Laverne
ShortDescription: Eastbound #78 Montrose buses are temporarily rerouted via Montrose, Laramie, Irving Park, Cicero, Montrose, due to street blockage near Montrose/Laverne.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
